title: Integration of International Medical Graduates into the NHS: A Five-Year Cohort Study
abstract: Cohort analysis of IMG onboarding outcomes across 37 NHS Trusts, examining retention rates, clinical performance metrics, and integration challenges. This study provides evidence-based recommendations for improving IMG workforce sustainability in the UK healthcare system.
dataStatement: Dataset and code available on Zenodo (CC BY 4.0): https://zenodo.org/record/12345
ethics: REC approval: 21/NE/0123. All participants provided informed consent.
funding: Funded by NHS England Workforce Innovation Grant.
conflicts: The authors declare no conflicts of interest.

citation.harvard: Johnson S, Thompson M (2025) Integration of IMGs into the NHS: A Five-Year Cohort Study. NextDoc Labs. doi:10.5678/ndglabs.2025.001
citation.vancouver: Johnson S, Thompson M. Integration of IMGs into the NHS: A Five-Year Cohort Study. NextDoc Labs. 2025; v1.0. doi:10.5678/ndglabs.2025.001

title: AI-Assisted PLAB Preparation: A Governance-First Implementation Framework
abstract: Practical, NICE-aligned AI blueprint for assessment and feedback loops in medical examination preparation. This framework addresses ethical considerations, data governance, and clinical validation requirements for AI-powered medical education tools.
ethics: No human subjects research; framework development study.

citation.harvard: Khanderi R (2025) AI-Assisted PLAB Preparation: A Governance-First Framework. NextDoc Labs. v1.1.
citation.vancouver: Khanderi R. AI-Assisted PLAB Preparation: Governance-First Framework. NextDoc Labs. 2025; v1.1.

changeLog.notes: Added NICE alignment section and updated governance checklist

title: Structured Mentorship Protocol for International Medical Graduates: A Registered Report
abstract: Pre-registered study protocol examining the efficacy of structured mentorship interventions for IMGs across 12 NHS Trusts. This protocol details randomization procedures, outcome measures, and statistical analysis plans prior to data collection.
dataStatement: Data collection in progress. Dataset will be published upon study completion.
ethics: REC approval: 23/LO/0456. Study registered at ClinicalTrials.gov: NCT05123456.

citation.harvard: Sharma P, Mitchell J (2025) Structured Mentorship Protocol for IMGs: A Registered Report. NextDoc Labs. doi:10.5678/ndglabs.2025.002
citation.vancouver: Sharma P, Mitchell J. Structured Mentorship Protocol for IMGs: A Registered Report. NextDoc Labs. 2025; v1.0. doi:10.5678/ndglabs.2025.002

title: Cultural Competency Training in UK Healthcare: A Systematic Review
abstract: PRISMA-compliant systematic review synthesizing evidence from 47 studies on cultural competency interventions for healthcare professionals in the UK. Includes meta-analysis of patient satisfaction outcomes and recommendations for curriculum integration.
dataStatement: Search strategy, extraction forms, and analysis code: https://osf.io/abc123/
ethics: Secondary data analysis; no ethical approval required.

citation.harvard: Rahman A, Hughes T (2025) Cultural Competency Training in UK Healthcare: A Systematic Review. NextDoc Labs. doi:10.5678/ndglabs.2025.003
citation.vancouver: Rahman A, Hughes T. Cultural Competency Training in UK Healthcare: A Systematic Review. NextDoc Labs. 2025; v1.0. doi:10.5678/ndglabs.2025.003

title: Policy Brief: Sustainable IMG Workforce Planning for NHS Trusts
abstract: Evidence-based policy recommendations for NHS workforce leaders on international medical graduate recruitment, retention, and integration strategies. Includes implementation toolkit and cost-benefit analysis.

citation.harvard: Foster D, Osman L (2025) Policy Brief: Sustainable IMG Workforce Planning for NHS Trusts. NextDoc Labs. v1.0.
citation.vancouver: Foster D, Osman L. Policy Brief: Sustainable IMG Workforce Planning. NextDoc Labs. 2025; v1.0.

title: OSCE Performance Dataset: International Medical Graduates (2020-2024)
abstract: De-identified dataset containing OSCE scores, demographics, and training characteristics for 1,247 IMGs across 8 UK medical schools. Includes codebook, analysis scripts (R & Python), and data dictionary.
dataStatement: Full dataset and documentation: https://zenodo.org/record/7654321 (CC BY 4.0)
ethics: REC approval: 20/SC/0234. Data fully anonymized per ICO guidelines.

citation.harvard: Clarke E (2025) OSCE Performance Dataset: International Medical Graduates (2020-2024). Zenodo. doi:10.5281/zenodo.7654321
